同.definition: like; same; similar; together; alike; with

同一個世界，同一個夢想.pinyin: tong2 yi1 ge4 shi4 jie4 , tong2 yi1 ge4 meng4 xiang3
同一個世界，同一個夢想.definition: One world - one dream, motto of 2008 Beijing Olympic games

同一掛.definition: (coll.) to have a lot in common (with sb); to get along well with each other

同人.definition: people from the same workplace or profession; co-worker; colleague; pop culture enthusiasts who create fan fiction etc

同仇敵愾.definition: anger against a common enemy (idiom); joined in opposition to the same adversary

同傳.definition: simultaneous interpretation (abbr. for 同聲傳譯|同声传译[tong2 sheng1 chuan2 yi4])

同儕.definition: peer; member of the same class, generation or social group

同化作用.definition: assimilation; anabolism (biology); constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)

同名.definition: of the same name; homonymous; self-titled (album)

同名同姓.definition: having same given name and family name

同喜.definition: Thank you for your congratulations!; The same to you! (returning a compliment)

同堂.definition: to live under the same roof (of different generations)

同妻.definition: (neologism c. 2009) wife of a gay man (the man may marry to conform with social expectations, and the woman often enters the marriage not knowing he is gay)

同字框.definition: name of the radical 冂[jiong1] in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 13)

同學.definition: to study at the same school; fellow student; classmate; CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]

同安.definition: Tong'an, a district of Xiamen City 廈門市|厦门市[Xia4men2 Shi4], Fujian

同安區.definition: Tong'an, a district of Xiamen City 廈門市|厦门市[Xia4men2 Shi4], Fujian

同安縣.definition: former Tong'an county, now Tong'an district 同安區|同安区[Tong2 an1 qu1] of Xiamen city, Fujian

同宗同源.definition: to share the same origins; to have common roots

同室操戈.definition: wielding the halberd within the household (idiom); internecine strife

同床共枕.definition: to share the bed; (fig.) to be married

同床異夢.definition: lit. to share the same bed with different dreams (idiom); ostensible partners with different agendas; strange bedfellows; marital dissension

同德.definition: Tongde county in Hainan Tibetan autonomous prefecture 海南藏族自治州[Hai3 nan2 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

同德縣.definition: Tongde county in Hainan Tibetan autonomous prefecture 海南藏族自治州[Hai3 nan2 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

同心.definition: to be of one mind; united; concentric

同心協力.definition: to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts; to pull together; to work as one

同心縣.definition: Tongxin county in Wuzhong 吳忠|吴忠[Wu2 zhong1], Ningxia

同性戀恐懼症.pinyin: tong2 xing4 lian4 kong3 ju4 zheng4

同性相斥.definition: like polarities repel each other; (fig.) like repels like

同情者.definition: supporter; sympathizer (esp. of political cause); fellow traveler

同意.definition: to agree; to consent; to approve

同感.definition: (have the) same feeling; similar impression; common feeling

同房.definition: (of a married couple) to have intercourse; (literary) to share the same room; of the same family branch

同文館.definition: Tongwen Guan, 19th century college that trained translators for China's diplomatic corps, established in Beijing in 1862 and absorbed by the Imperial University in 1902

同日而語.definition: lit. to speak of two things on the same day (idiom); to mention things on equal terms (often with negatives: you can't mention X at the same time as Y)

同期.definition: the corresponding time period (in a different year etc); concurrent; synchronous

同框.definition: to appear together in a photo or video clip

同業.definition: same trade or business; person in the same trade or business

同業拆借.definition: call loan; short-term loan within banking

同樂會.definition: social gathering at which those attending take it in turns to perform for the whole group (music, dancing or comedy etc)

同樣.definition: same; equal; similar; similarly; also; too

同款.definition: similar (model); merchandise similar to that used by a celebrity etc

同步.definition: synchronous; to synchronize; to keep step with

同步數位階層.pinyin: tong2 bu4 shu4 wei4 jie1 ceng2

同歸於盡.definition: to die in such a way that sb (or sth) else also perishes; to take sb down with oneself; to end in mutual destruction

同母異父.definition: (of siblings) having the same mother but different fathers; half (brother or sister)

同比.definition: (statistics) compared with the same period of the previous year; year on year; year over year

同江.definition: Tongjiang, county-level city in Kiamusze or Jiamusi city 佳木斯[Jia1 mu4 si1], Heilongjiang

同江市.definition: Tongjiang, county-level city in Kiamusze or Jiamusi city 佳木斯[Jia1 mu4 si1], Heilongjiang

同流合污.definition: to wallow in the mire with sb (idiom); to follow the bad example of others

同源詞.definition: cognate; words having a common origin

同濟.definition: abbr. of 同濟大學|同济大学[Tong2 ji4 Da4 xue2]

同父異母.definition: (of siblings) having the same father but different mothers; half (brother or sister)

同班.definition: to be in the same class; to be in the same squad; classmate

同甘共苦.definition: shared delights and common hardships (idiom); to share life's joys and sorrows; for better or for worse

同甘苦.definition: to share joys and sorrows; sharing good times and hard times; same as 同甘共苦

同病相憐.definition: fellow sufferers empathize with each other (idiom); misery loves company

同盟會.definition: Tongmenghui, Sun Yat-sen's alliance for democracy, founded 1905, became the Guomindang 國民黨|国民党 in 1912

同符合契.definition: same sign, joint aim (idiom); fig. completely compatible; identical

同等.definition: equal to; having the same social class or status

同級.definition: on the same level; ranking equally

同翅目.definition: Homoptera (insect suborder including cicadas, aphids, plant-hoppers, shield bugs etc)

同聲一哭.definition: to share one's feeling of grief with others (idiom)

同胞.definition: born of the same parents; sibling; fellow citizen; compatriot

同臺.definition: to appear on the same stage

同舟共濟.definition: cross a river in the same boat (idiom); fig. having common interests; obliged to collaborate towards common goals

同袍.definition: fellow soldier; comrade; companion; intimate friend

同調.definition: same tone; in agreement with; homology (invariant of a topological space in math.)

同謀.definition: to conspire with sb; to plot; a conspirator; a partner in crime; an accomplice

同輩.definition: of the same generation; person of the same generation; peer

同途殊歸.definition: same road out, different ones back

同鄉.definition: person from the same village, town, or province

同鄉親故.definition: fellow countryman (from the same village); the folks back home

同音字.definition: Chinese character that is pronounced the same (as another character)

同韻詞.definition: a word that rhymes (with another word)

同餘.definition: congruent (math.); having same residue modulo some number

同餘式.definition: congruence (math.); equation for residue modulo some number

同黨.definition: to belong to the same party or organization; member of the same party or organization; (derog.) confederate; accomplice

同齡人.definition: peer; one's contemporary; person of the same age
